headline: HONEYWELL APPOINTS INDRA NOOYI TO BOARD OF DIRECTORS
summary: Honeywell (NASDAQ: HON) announced today that its Board of Directors has appointed Indra Nooyi, 70, former Chair and Chief Executive Officer of PepsiCo, to its Board of Directors as an Independent Director, effective January 1, 2026.

headline: Before The Crowd Sees It, I'm Positioning For A Super Bullish New Year
summary: I see stagflation and recession fears as overblown, with leading indicators pointing toward economic recovery. Read more about the market outlook here.

headline: Vertical Aerospace Unveils Valo - the eVTOL Aircraft Set to Redefine Urban Air Mobility and Usher in a New Era of Flight
summary: LONDON, December 10, 2025--Vertical Aerospace (NYSE: EVTL) ("Vertical" or "the Company"), a global aerospace and technology company that is pioneering electric aviation, today revealed Valo, its new commercial eVTOL aircraft that will enter into service following regulatory approval.
